original_text:
A prophecy against Egypt:
See, the Lord rides on a swift cloud
    and is coming to Egypt.
The idols of Egypt tremble before him,
    and the hearts of the Egyptians melt with fear.

sentences.original_text: See, the Lord rides on a swift cloud
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 주께서 빠른 구름을 타고 오시니

sentences.original_text: The idols of Egypt tremble before him,
and the hearts of the Egyptians melt with fear.
